__Comment_1: Whitelist characters that you don't want to be replaced with another character.
__Comment_2: Each string may contain only one (1) character.
__Comment_3: These default whitelisted characters correct the Unicode.org confusables (confusables.txt).
__Comment_4: An example of a correction is 'm' -> 'rn'.
__ranges: The nested arrays are the start and end character of a range.
__characters: Characters is an array with string characters.
